Latest Event

Launch of “Vibes” magazine

Its objective: to decode the major trends of the mobility revolution. Come aboard and discover our technologies and how our experts, on a daily basis, are inventing more sustainable mobility for future generations.

In this first edition, discover the ongoing Chinese mobility revolution, while Alexandre Corjon, our EVP Innovation & Software, will share his vision of OPmobility’s electric solutions.
